meanings.definition: The act of compressing and tying together hay, straw, or other materials into a compact bundle.
meanings.sent1: After the harvest, the farmer started baling the hay to store it for the winter.
meanings.sent2: The workers used a machine to speed up the baling process on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The cows watched curiously as the baling machine hummed along in the field.
meanings.sent4: She approached her problems with the efficiency of a baling machine, quickly bundling them up.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the baling process was oddly satisfying, like watching a puzzle come together.
